department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of Volvo VNR Electric Class 8 truck
description: Transport Canada (TC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) Volvo VNR Electric Class 8, 4x2 Truck-tractor. The details to this requirement can be found at Annex Statement of Requirement/Technical Criteria of the solicitation.
full_summary:
## A Request for Proposal for a Volvo VNR Electric Class 8, 4x2 Truck-tractor
### Announcement Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4452046538-Doc4461898810
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** March 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 19, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Charter Allignment:** GAR

### Description of Requirement
The Department of Transport (TC) requires the supply and delivery of one (1) Volvo VNR Electric Class 8, 4x2 Truck-tractor. Details of this requirement can be found in the annex statement of requirement/technical criterias attached to this announcemnt.

## Evaluation Criteria
Offers from only authorized Volvo Dealers or Volvo Manufacturers will be entertained.

## Tender Period
This Tender Opportunity has expired. No new bid will be accepted.

## How to Submit a Bid
The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted in English or French on or before the specified Tender Closing Date.

## Contacts
For all inquires or clarifications, kindly contact:

Jacques Legault (SPAC/PSPC)  
jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Note:** Bids submitted after the Tender Closing Date will not be eligible for evaluation.

(Note: the response has been rewritten in compliance with the requirements and also formatted in markdown style for better visibility and readability) 

Let me know if you need any changes or need further assistance.  You will need to document changes to contracts or temp work agreements.   Let me know if you'd like some help with those too. 

Let me know if you have any other details that need to amend, you don't have to include all the ones in the inital prompt.   Just 300 - 400 words document, here.   I can leave some finalize option on you to gloss the final version.  Let me know when done, we would be able check n all aspects also here as Just compare - as you ref.  .:.:.:.:
